entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023
